location: Located at 7th Avenue J.P. Rizal Extension
about:
In 1954, the Philippine Armed Forces through the Office of General Alfonso Arellano, commanding General of Fort Bonifacio authorized the construction of settlements for enlisted men serving in the armed forces who were based in Fort Bonifacio. Geographically, East Rembo is at the heart of three barrios namely: West Rembo, Comembo and Pembo. These settlements were named after the special units of the Armed Forces of the geographical location within or around the Fort.
According to those who have been living in the barrio since its establishment, East Rembo is a self-sustaining community. The military administration of the Fort did not need to provide any assistance to the barrio. The families cooperated and coordinated to build the spirit of bayanihan in the community. The military administration of the barrio begun in 1956 and in the latter years when then, President Ferdinand E. Marcos issued Presidential Proclamation 2425 and was implemented in 1986 by then President Corazon C. Aquino granting land titles to its occupants. The barrios geographical-political boundary was turned-over to the civilian administration of the Municipality of Makati.
mission: To define areas for land and land use management, highly commercialized area along National Road, C-5, R-4 Kalayaan and JP Rizal Ext. Sitio 1 Commercial area for Information Technology and Novelty Shops; Sitio 2 Eatery and Bakeshop; Sitio 3 Cultural Heritage area; Sitio 4 Commercial and Dormitory-type Buildings; Sitio 5 Travellers'' Inn and Terminal areas; Sitio 6 Motor Shop and Hardware to make area along Kalayaan attractive to investors, with the establishments of fastfoods, drugstores and gasoline station.
vision: We envision a highly sustainable community whose residents have equal opportunity for self-employment, fulfillment to chosen endeavor and self-reliance through effective management and governance with active participation in improving concerned areas such as health, education, and security and information technology.

props.name: Slope Characteristics
props.value: Moderately ndulating and rolling sloping in many directions
